metadata.description: Lux DEX SDK - CLOB client, AMM precompiles, and omnichain routing

options.command: bun run e2e:generate-ids && bun run e2e:build-js
bun run e2e:local:extract-metrics && bun run e2e:local:submit-metrics
bunx react-native bundle --entry-file apps/mobile/index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ./ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ./ios --sourcemap-output ./ios/main.jsbundle.map
EXPO_ANDROID_LAUNCH_ACTIVITY='com.lux.mobile.dev/com.lux.MainActivity' EXPO_BUILD_CONFIGURATION=Debug NODE_ENV=development bunx expo start --scheme lux
cd scripts && python3 populate_svgs.py && cd .. && bun run lint --fix
test -f src/abis/types/index.ts && echo 'abi types exist' || typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir src/abis/types "./src/abis/**/*.json"
test -f src/abis/types/v3/index.ts && echo 'v3 types exist' || typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir src/abis/types/v3 "../../node_modules/@uniswap/**/artifacts/contracts/**/*[!dbg].json"
bun nx watch --projects @luxfi/cli --includeDependentProjects -- bun nx build-deps @luxfi/cli
echo 'GraphQL generation handled by uniswap package'
VITE_DISABLE_SOURCEMAP=true CLOUDFLARE_ENV=staging ROLLDOWN_OPTIONS_VALIDATION=loose vite build --mode staging
DEPLOY_TARGET=vercel REACT_APP_IS_PLAYWRIGHT_ENV=true REACT_APP_SKIP_CSP=1 VITE_DISABLE_SOURCEMAP=true nx run web:build:production
DEPLOY_TARGET=vercel REACT_APP_IS_PLAYWRIGHT_ENV=true REACT_APP_SKIP_CSP=1 VITE_DISABLE_SOURCEMAP=true ROLLDOWN_OPTIONS_VALIDATION=loose vite preview --port 3000
NODE_OPTIONS='--no-deprecation' vitest run src/hooks src/nft src/utils
concurrently -s second -n "SB RUN,SB TEST WATCH" -c "magenta,blue" "bun run storybook:run --quiet" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:6006 -t 600000 && bun run storybook:test --watch"

concurrently -k -s first -n "SB BUILD,SB TEST" -c "magenta,blue" "bun run storybook:build && http-server storybook-static --port 6006 --silent" "wait-on --timeout 600000 tcp:127.0.0.1:6006 && bun run storybook:test --maxWorkers=2"
